title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 355 - Information Pamphlets; Notification Of Decisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 355 - Information Pamphlets; Notification Of Decisions

State Regulations
§ 355.1 - Responsibility of social services agency to provide information to applicants and recipients
§ 355.2 - Informational pamphlets
§ 355.3 - Notification of local department decisions- all programs except SSI and MA
§ 355.4 - Notification of local department decisions-SSI and MA
§ 355.5 - Transfers and reclassifications

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 355

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 131

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
